code: export var getRandomValue=function getRandomValue(max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*max);};export var updateCircleColor=function updateCircleColor(btn,color){btn[2]=color;return btn;};export var audioClick=function audioClick(answer){var rightAnswer=new Audio("./assets/true.mp3");var wrongAnswer=new Audio("./assets/wrong.mp3");if(answer){rightAnswer.play();}else{wrongAnswer.play();}};
